title: Energy: a national issue
creator_credit: Gerard H. Baldwin, Ross M Sutherland, Instructional Media and Hanna-Barbera Productions
brief_description: Animated film featuring the Flintstones with narration by Charlton Heston to explain the problems of a dwindling energy supply and the means by which to obtain more efficient energy use. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
